titles.title: Lower Rogue Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to add certain segments to the Rogue River designation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 6/16/2009--Introduced. Lower Rogue Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 2009 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to add specified segments of creeks to the designation of the Rogue River in Oregon as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.
